CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Shuttle Pharmaceuticals Holdings Inc is a clinical stage pharmaceutical company leveraging our proprietary technology to develop novel therapies designed to cure cancers. The company's goal is to extend the benefits of cancer treatments by leveraging insights into the pillars of cancer therapy: surgery, radiation therapy, chemotherapy, and immunotherapy.
